question: The "Muuga Harbour" is located in which country?
explanation: Muuga Harbour is the biggest cargo harbour in Estonia. Muuga Harbour is one of the deepest and most modern ports in the Baltic Sea region. Muuga Harbour is the main cargo harbour for the port of Tallinn.Â  It is specialised on handle transit origin goods. The cargo volume handled in Muuga Harbour accounts for 50% of the total cargo volume of the port of Tallinn and 40% of the transit volume passing through Estonia.
